CustomField.formula: IF( (NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)<90, 'less than 90', IF( AND( (NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)>=120, (NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)<=180 ),'121-180 days', IF( AND( (NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)>180, (NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)<=365 ),'181-365 days', IF( AND( (NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)>365, (NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)<=730 ),'1 to 2 years', IF( (NON_RFND_safeguard_completed_date__c - Clear_days_waiting_period_start_date__c)>730, 'More than 2 years','')))) )
CustomField.label: Length of assessment period
